title: Audit Government Contract Compliance
description: A compliance auditor reviews a large government contract to ensure the company is meeting all its terms.

tasks.description: Review the contract to identify all specific reporting and performance requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor creates a checklist of all contractual obligations.

tasks.description: Verify that all required monthly progress reports have been submitted on time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms all reports were submitted by their deadlines.

tasks.description: Test the billing for the contract to ensure that labor rates and material costs are being charged in accordance with the contract's strict pricing rules.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds that some labor hours were billed at a higher rate than allowed by the contract.
